title: Oh Guys, Baker Pantheon's going to be an actual thing!

embed.description: "You know, now that I think of it, I've always wanted to be a baker." - Pantheon

replies.body: https://memecrunch.com/meme/8RAXC/tychus/image.png?w=500&c=1
After many failed tests {{champion:80}}  finally passed gordon ramsey's hell's kitchen show.
He just needed someone (other than Morgana) to teach him; enter Master Chef TK.
and yet we still don't have pizza girl sivir????

I surely hope Morgana is going to have a place in TK's and Pantheon's restaurant.
You can't leave her operating a food cart forever.
That's just mean
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

She's on the next season of Kitchen Nightmares. Or if this was a cooking show she's already been eliminated. Poor Morg will her jongerbronds ever be unburnt?

Incidentally the Sinful Succulence stall showed up in my D&D campaign with her burned jongerbronds being for sale. The tiefling warlock fed one to her pet baby dinosaur and it died instantly! Fortunately she was able to split her soul into fragments and revive the dino as a horcrux of sorts.
I respect her determination!
I, wait, what?
so the dino souls is in small pieces you say? Dino-mite!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Or he just got rid of Gordon Ramsey:

https://youtu.be/WEkpj2lpLD8?t=31

ok I'm hyped.

EDIT: Imagine if its gonna be a legendary o.o
Upon getting a kill: ''Piece of cake''
First Yorick and now Baker Pantheon?  Is Riot trying to catch up to all their memes?

They also gave us  a train skin for Sion.. Good job Riot!
Now we just need a ''hi I'm Jarvan IV I'm helping'' skin, and a Kitty Cat Rengar skin...
Where's my Dia de los Muertekaiser then?!
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4Vd1JP56G2w/hqdefault.jpg

A-_hem_.

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1414781351675/diadelosmuertosthresh1.jpg
...IT'S BEAUTIFUL!!!
They could release Mordekäser as Lord of deadly cheese
and a Karthus skin. :P
he turns into a train in mecha sion
That... is kinda my point ._.
Is this real, or a fan made video?
Well it was posted by League's official facebook, so yeah. The real deal.
*crosses everything in hopes of Pizza Girl Sivir*

http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bxNXC-acbSw/UNXCVeOuDPI/AAAAAAAAFXI/YD0paKQWbf4/s1600/Pizza-Girl-Sivir-by-Mattcomgo.jpg http://41.media.tumblr.com/b7d46e58c89eacdae176c982dda20ab4/tumblr_nhiweiks2P1rgdio9o1_1280.png

At one of the PAX's they drew a design
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-boWe1WRE56w/UiX5-g4019I/AAAAAAAAGqs/uB9aeMR9rhA/s640/BTLcVEWCYAAvP7-.jpg
Papa'Zir's Pizzaria
Why not baker fiora and you could name the skin definetly not fiora :l
Because it's Panth's joke. Like it's his quote. He's a baker.

["My profession?! You know, now that I think of it, I've always wanted to be a baker."](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/9b/Pantheon.joke1.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121126230824)
I did not know this cause i never play panth lol my bad guys and Ebonyblade, now i want her to have a artist skin :c

All that's left is to make farmer Nasus.

http://i.imgur.com/bmD68k5.png

https://media.giphy.com/media/5GoVLqeAOo6PK/giphy.gif
OMG, They are actually making it. They are ACTUALLY MAKING Baker Pantheon!!!
https://admin.mashable.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Jeremy-Renner.gif
https://media.giphy.com/media/q6QHDGE3X4EWA/giphy.gif

Emote when he mandrops: 

>You can't make a cake without breaking some _eggs!_ 

_[Emphasis on the word "eggs" as he lands]_

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YEqz448J,comment-id=0011,timestamp=2016-08-22T21:46:06.655+0000)
>
> Emote when he mandrops: 
> 
> _[Emphasis on the word "eggs" as he lands]_

currently imagining a crazed baker jumping on me screaming EGGGGGGGGGGS

I like it

>currently imagining a crazed baker jumping on me screaming EGGGGGGGGGGS

Here you go, Sir/Ma'am:

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/1fcee07fb76a23a9d704597a88643843.jpg
If his joke isn't changed, I'm going to be HIGHLY dissappointed
http://i.imgur.com/7drHiqr.gif
Now Zac needs a debonair skin
WHY IS HIS WEAPON NOT A BAGUETTE?!

because he's not a frenchie like {{champion:114}} {{champion:7}}, he is a spartan, so an actual weapon suits him better. Truthfully though I would have enjoyed it to have been a whisk so he can "whisk people to death" with his E.
If he is truly scheduled to have a VGU/VU, then this will be our way of remembering the old Pantheon, finally having achieved his dream before all traces of his old self were swept away.

why would he need a gameplay update? .  . . 
he's fine

> [{quoted}](name=VivaLaKitten,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YEqz448J,comment-id=001c0000,timestamp=2016-08-25T00:13:07.771+0000)
>
> why would he need a gameplay update? .  . . 
> he's fine

It has been mentioned that Pantheon is on the "consideration" list for a VU/VGU. Only mentioned, it has not been confirmed by any sources at Riot.

but why consider it, he's very balanced atm
;-;

> [{quoted}](name=VivaLaKitten,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YEqz448J,comment-id=001c000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-25T00:22:03.210+0000)
>
> but why consider it, he's very balanced atm
> ;-;

Hey, I'm not Riot, I don't know why. If anything, it's probably to make him fit more with his re-written lore. Besides, it might just be a Visual Upgrade, with no changes to his actual skill-set. Like I said though, it's not CONFIRMED. As in, they have not decided whether it's going to happen anyway.

I highly doubt it,
it's not needed
besides with him having a skin coming out soon I doubt it will happen

> [{quoted}](name=VivaLaKitten,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YEqz448J,comment-id=001c00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-25T00:58:29.529+0000)
>
> I highly doubt it,
> it's not needed
> besides with him having a skin coming out soon I doubt it will happen

Well then, let's not worry about it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKfCeFOqwVA

Predicted it since 2015.
